response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $1,200,000. Considering its immense potential impact on your business, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,500,000. This is an opportunity to secure a game-changing asset at a premium that reflects its true market value and future growth potential. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further.", "product_price": 1500000}
